flawed_nl_solution:
40% of the class is boys because 100-60=<<100-60=40>>40
There are 10 boys because 25x0.4=<<25*0.4=10>>10
60% of the boys don't like playing basketball because 100-40=<<100-40=60>>60
6 boys don't like playing basketball because 10x0.6=6
21 girls like playing basketball because 6x2=<<6*2=21>>21
There are 15 girls in the class because 25-10=<<25-10=15>>15
80% of the girls in class like playing basketball because 21/15=<<21/15=1.4>>1.4
#### 140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
